name: siddash
description: BSD Portfolio & Admin Panel - Monorepo with concurrent startup capabilities

scripts.start:portfolio: cd bsd-portfolio && cross-env PORT=3000 npm start
scripts.start:admin: cd bsd-admin-panel && cross-env PORT=3001 npm start
scripts.build: npm run build:portfolio && npm run build:admin
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd bsd-portfolio && npm install && cd ../bsd-admin-panel && npm install
